metadata.name: Foundation Node
metadata.description:
Welcome to Apex Traders Society, a cross-chain, utility-focused NFT project backed by a real business.

ATS Foundation Nodes are the first limited set of NFTs to be ever deployed by retail finance start-up Automatic Trading Solution.

Foundation Nodes are a key component of ATS' Web3 ecosystem and their primary short term utility is that of providing free access to our main collection Apex Traders Society. Long term wise, Foundation Nodes will act as an important utility booster for holders of ATS main collection.
